title: Online Examination and Evaluation System
description: Our project, the Online Examination and Evaluation System, revolutionizes educational assessment by digitizing exams, grading, and feedback delivery, fostering efficiency and accessibility. Developed as part of our 7th-semester coursework, this system implements secure user authentication, a Randomized Test Generation Algorithm, and an Automated Score and Evaluation Algorithm.

title: React.Js library and GitHub
description: I utilized ReactJS to develop a project, harnessing its component-based architecture to create an intuitive and responsive user interface. The project is hosted on GitHub, serving as a collaborative platform for version control and demonstrating my expertise in front-end development using ReactJS
